description: A reference to a resource, including it's ID, type, and a link to retrieve the resource.
title: resourceReference

$eref.description: Specifies relationships between the current document and an external resource.
$eref.title: link

___href.description: A URL. Specifies the location of the linked document.

___type.description: Specifies the media type of the linked document.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, link.

___title.description: Provide additional / advisory information (expand on the meaning of the link).

___method.description: Specifies how to send the data (e.g. get, post).

___rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document.

___link.description: A link for accessing the resource.

___type.description: Specifies the type for the referenced resource.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, resourceReference.
